00033 #define MAX_ENTRIES 1024
00034 
00035 /* Usage pattern for CameraList for users external of
00036  * libgphoto2, such as libgphoto2 frontends:
00037  *
00038  *    CameraList *list;
00039  *    gp_list_new (&list);
00040  *    init_list_somehow (list);
00041  *    for (i=0; i < gp_list_count(list); i++) {
00042  *        char *name, *value;
00043  *        gp_list_get_name (list, i, &name);
00044  *        gp_list_get_name (list, i, &value);
00045  *        do_something_with (name, value);
00046  *    }
00047  *    gp_list_free (list);
00048  *
00049  * Please do NOT directly instantiate a CameraList object like this:
00050  *               CameraList foo;     // DO NOT DO THIS
00051  * Please do NOT directly access the structure members like this:
00052  *               list->entry[i].name // DO NOT DO THIS
00053  */
00054 struct _CameraList {
00055         int  count;
00056         struct {
00057                 char name  [128];
00058                 char value [128];
00059         } entry [MAX_ENTRIES];
00060         int ref_count;
00061 };
00062 typedef struct _CameraList CameraList;

00066 int     gp_list_unref (CameraList *list);

00071                             const char *name, const char *value);

00079 int gp_list_set_value (CameraList *list, int index, const char *value);
